thread.title: Russia's foreign minister calls for 'post-West world order' in speech to global leaders | The Independent
thread.title_full: Russia's foreign minister calls for 'post-West world order' in speech to global leaders | The Independent

author: Lizzie Dearden
title: Russia's foreign minister calls for 'post-West world order' in speech to global leaders | The Independent
text:
Saturday 18 February 2017 12:07 GMT Click to followThe Independent Online 
Russia’s foreign minister has called for a “post-West world order” while addressing global leaders at an international security conference. 
Sergey Lavrov accused Nato of being a Cold War institution and accused its “expansion” of sparking unprecedented tensions in Europe. 
In a speech watched by US Vice President Mike Pence, he said the Kremlin wants to have a “pragmatic” relationship with the Trump administration. 
More to follow
